mapper.select:
SELECT r.movieno, t.theaternm, r.viewday, r.roomno, r.tmember, rv.review, rv.star, m.moviepostimg, m.movienm FROM reservetb r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewtb rv ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN movietb2 m ON r.movieno = m.movieno LEFT OUTER JOIN theatertb t ON r.areano = t.areano AND r.theaterno = t.theaterno
WHERE r.viewday < NOW()
AND r.uuid = #{uuid} order by r.viewday desc
SELECT count(*) FROM reservetb r WHERE r.viewday < NOW() AND r.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT li.movieno, m.moviepostimg, m.movienm, m.releaseday, m.endday, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM liketb WHERE movieno = li.movieno ) AS scrapRate -- 각 영화별 'scrapRate' 추가 FROM liketb li LEFT OUTER JOIN movietb2 m ON li.movieno = m.movieno WHERE li.uuid = #{uuid} ORDER BY m.releaseday DESC

SELECT r.movieno, MAX(r.viewday) AS viewday, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm FROM reviewtb rv LEFT OUTER JOIN reservetb r ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN movietb2 m ON r.movieno = m.movieno
WHERE r.viewday < NOW()
AND r.uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY r.movieno, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm ORDER BY viewday DESC
